name: zipcode-ng
description: Retrieve postal/zip code details of places in Nigeria with ease using the ZipCodeNG package. Seamlessly integrate postal code data into your client-side JavaScript applications. This package simplifies API calls to the VendBox service, providing accurate state-level postal information for Nigerian locations.

scripts.create-project: npm list --depth 0 --json || (npm init -y && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const packageJson = require('./package.json'); packageJson.type = 'module'; fs.writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(packageJson, null, 2));")

author: Awesome Goodman
